meanings.sent1: The dipteron buzzed around the garden.
meanings.sent2: I saw a dipteron flying near the flowers.
meanings.sent3: The dipteron seemed to be dancing in the air.
meanings.sent4: The dipteron's wings shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The tiny dipteron landed softly on the leaf.

meanings.definition: An insect of the order Diptera.
meanings.sent1: A dipteron landed on the picnic blanket.
meanings.sent2: The dipteron larvae develop in water.
meanings.sent3: The dipteron family reunion was quite the buzz.
meanings.sent4: The dipteron's flight was swift and graceful.
meanings.sent5: The dipteron's presence signaled the start of summer.
